ImageSizeAffectsRowHeight.description: Sets whether the image size will affect the GridRow's height. This property is only supported in iOS. On Android, the image size is preset within a 40dp frame which does not affect the row height. On Web, the image size will always affect the row height.

enum.description: The value that indicates wrapping occurs at word boundaries, unless the word doesn't fit on a single line.
The value that indicates wrapping occurs before the first character that doesn't fit.

The value that indicates a line displays so that the beginning fits in the container and an ellipsis glyph indicates the missing text at the end of the line.
The value that indicates that a line displays so that the beginning and end fit in the container and an ellipsis glyph indicates the missing text in the middle.
